{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Great Ball |image = [[File:Great Ball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Great Ball''. |price = 500 {{pdollar}} |catchTime = 1s |catchRate = 5% |location =
*[[Great Ball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Great Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Great Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== A better Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it provides a +5% catch rate bonus and catches Pokémon in 1 second. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} |- {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations &
